column1: 13. Did the Commission err in law in arriving at the erroneous conclusion that:

column2: (a) The overseas company to which the Appellant provided services had
a permanent establishment in Sri Lanka?
(b) The existence of a permanent establishment in Sri Lanka disentitled in
Revenue Act, No. 10 of 2006 as amended by Act, No. 19 of 2009?

column1: 14. Is  the  Appellant  entitled  in  law  to  the  exemption  set  out  in  section  13

column2: (dddd)  of  the  Inland  Revenue  Act,  No.  10  of  2006  as  amended  by  Act,

column1: 15. Did  the  Commission  fail  to  properly  examine  and/or appreciate  the  facts
